messages: ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (17:19): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: Regeneration is non-trivial, so I suggest just editing them manually for now
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (17:19): ("non-trivial" means I have to implement the new spec in OCaml)
ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (17:20): (and probably modify the way it decides which test cases to generate)
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (17:20): ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c: But functional programming is supposed to be so simple :)

ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c (17:21): but still I'd have to read the spec and work out what's changed
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (17:22): ab7faae5d7b250ea8606486575f8f79c: Maybe you should hve ritten it in lisp. It is well knon that lisp solves all problems for you

b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (18:18): are you guys trying to make it to Last Week?
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (18:19): I don't have to try to make it to Last Week
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (18:19): It just happens on its own
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (18:25): I gave up trying to make MLW when it became obvious how easy that was
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (18:26): Although the last few times I'm just collateral damage for saying things inbetween the real juicy lines
eca88ce0deea1275223afe139b2595e2 (18:26): Good morning all!
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (18:27): How open are the various adobe things he lists as open?
b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea (18:28): eca88ce0deea1275223afe139b2595e2: The i18n people will have you for comments like that
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (18:28): I heard something about only the RTMP spec being released, but in a way so it wasn't possible to actually use it

eca88ce0deea1275223afe139b2595e2 (18:31): b25b6b77a0087ff8385941e5545d32ea: I come from MIT: "good morning" is an appropriate salutation for whenever you've woken up, whether it be 10AM, 2PM, 6PM, or 1AM
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (18:33): But what if we haven't just woken up?
a924fb58d2c25874322f4e5126f608b9 (18:33): Why are you pushing your personal state onto us?
eca88ce0deea1275223afe139b2595e2 (18:33): laughs maniacally
